description.narrative: The proposed investment consists of up to INR 340 million in equity for a minority stake in Eye-Q Vision Private Limited (EyeQ or the Company) in order to finance the expansion of the Companys eye care services network in India.

The proposed investment is closely aligned to the World Bank Group''s strategy for private sector health care in India. The World Bank Group seeks to engage the private sector to increase and improve access to affordable, quality health services, particularly in underserved geographies such as Low-Income States and Tier II-III cities, while reducing the burdens of out of pocket health care expenditures. - Increase in patients reached (IDG 2): Expected to increase the number of patients reached by EyeQ''s healthcare services and contribute to IFC''s IDG 2 (patients reached) targets. - Reaching underserved geographies: Reducing geographic barriers to treatment and bringing eye care facilities closer to underserved patient populations. EyeQ''s strategy is to focus on areas outside of India''s major metros - currently about 90% of centers are in Tier II-III cities and more than 25% of centers are in Low-Income States of India. - Enhancing the country''s medical infrastructure: EyeQ plans to scale up its network, thereby enhancing the infrastructure for eye care in India, in addition to improving access to high quality service and improving health outcomes through standardized processes. - Increasing affordable access: The proposed Project targets to provide affordable and high quality eye care services. This is expected to have a demonstration effect on other players in the eye care and broader healthcare sector. - Employment generation: Expected to create additional skilled jobs (doctors, nurses, operations personnel etc.) including in Tier II-III cities. Of note, over 35% of EyeQ''s employees are women.

mailing-address.narrative: All inquiries and comments may be directed to: Contact Name: Rajat Goel Company Name: Eye-Q Vision Private Limited Address: 18th Floor, Building No. 5, Tower B, DLF Cyber Terraces, DLF Phase III, Gurgaon 122 002 E-mail: mailto:rajatg@eyeqindia.com

Corporate Office - Company Name: Eye-Q Vision Private Limited Contact Name: Mr Rajat Goel Address: 18th Floor, Building No. 5, Tower B, DLF Cyber Terraces, DLF Phase III, Gurgaon 122 002 E-mail: mailto:rajatg@eyeqindia.com Companys website : http://www.eyeqindia.com/

name.narrative: The Company is headquartered in Gurgaon, with a network of 28 centers across Northern and Western India. The additional capital will be used for further expansion of EyeQs network in India.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
